price: Nuko (amaze kurokoka umuriro) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri ngannye kwa Nyagasani wanjye, azanyobora.”
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
